comments.en:
The Oki C5800 / Olivetti d-Color P160W is a networked color laser printer with a 2006 street price of $399 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2hiperc open software printer driver.

Consumables: Separate toner cartridges black (1500 prints, ~$32), yellow/magenta/cyan (1500 prints, ~$65 each), separate drums black (15000 prints, ~$100), yellow/magenta/cyan (1500 prints, ~$120 each)
